general_advisory: Farmers are advised not to burn the residue of kharif crops in the fields as it pollutes the environment and causes health problems.

advisory: In transplanted rice, apply Bensulfuron methyl 0.6% + Pretilachlor 6% GR @ 4 kg/acre with 4 kg sand at 5-8 days after transplanting.
Monitor and apply granular insecticide if stem borer is observed.
Apply well powdered gypsum after weeding close to the base of the plant and irrigate.
Spray Chlorothalonil 75% WP to control tikka disease.
Spray Imidacloprid or Thiomethaxome to control aphid infestation.
To control YMV infestation, spray Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam.
To control shoot and fruit borer, spray Azadirachtin or Emamectin benzoate.
To control late blight, spray Azoxystrobin or Captan.
Spray Thiomethaxome to control leaf miner.
To control thrips, spray Thiamethoxam or Imidacloprid.
To control mango hopper infestation, spray Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam.
Spray Alpha Napthyl Acetic Acid when tender fruits are in pea size.
